In England, in the seven days to 28 August, there were 174,167 new confirmed cases (308.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 August, there were 186,913 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 7% (12,746 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 September is 5,933,034 (10,491.6 cases per 100,000 population).
